Retrieving multi-file ZIP resources

Source: vignettes/multifile_zip_resources.Rmd
multifile_zip_resources.Rmd

Some resources from the City of Toronto Open Data Portal are ZIP files containing multiple files. When a resource like this is retrieved using get_resource(), the result is a list with elements named after each file.

For example, the dataset on the Participatory Budgeting Pilot:

library(opendatatoronto)
library(dplyr)
#> 
#> Attaching package: 'dplyr'
#> The following objects are masked from 'package:stats':
#> 
#>     filter, lag
#> The following objects are masked from 'package:base':
#> 
#>     intersect, setdiff, setequal, union

budgeting_pilot_2017 <- search_packages("Participatory Budgeting Pilot") %>%
  list_package_resources() %>%
  filter(name == "2017-participatory-budgeting-ideas") %>%
  get_resource()
#> New names:
#> * `` -> ...2
#> * `` -> ...3
#> * `` -> ...4
#> * `` -> ...5
#> * `` -> ...6
#> * … and 6 more problems
#> New names:
#> * `` -> ...2
#> * `` -> ...3
#> * `` -> ...4
#> * `` -> ...5
#> * `` -> ...6
#> * … and 6 more problems
#> New names:
#> * `` -> ...2
#> * `` -> ...3
#> * `` -> ...4
#> * `` -> ...5
#> * `` -> ...6
#> * … and 6 more problems

str(budgeting_pilot_2017, max.level = 1)
#> List of 2
#>  $ 2017 ParticipatoryBudgetingIdeas_readme.xlsx:Classes 'tbl_df', 'tbl' and 'data.frame':    12 obs. of  3 variables:
#>  $ 2017PBideas.xlsx                            :List of 3

To access a single file, you can pull out the element by name:

budgeting_pilot_2017[["2017 ParticipatoryBudgetingIdeas_readme.xlsx"]]
#> # A tibble: 12 x 3
#>    `Field Name / Item … `Description / Definitio… `Comments / Examples`    
#>    <chr>                <chr>                     <chr>                    
#>  1 Idea                 Summary of resident idea  <NA>                     
#>  2 Description          More information of resi… <NA>                     
#>  3 Location             Summary of project locat… <NA>                     
#>  4 Located on City pro… Required criteria for fu… The project must be loca…
#>  5 Capital Project      Required criteria for fu… The project must be a ca…
#>  6 Located in Pilot Ar… Required criteria for fu… The project must be loca…
#>  7 Can complete in 18 … Required criteria for fu… The City must anticipate…
#>  8 Estimated to cost $… Required criteria for fu… The City must anticipate…
#>  9 PB is best City fun… Required criteria for fu… The project must free of…
#> 10 Estimated cost       City cost estimate based… <NA>                     
#> 11 City Comments        Additional comments from… <NA>                     
#> 12 Resident Comments    Additional comments from… <NA>
